description: Source code for a FastAPI backend API that manages a todo list, including endpoints for health checks, listing, creating, updating, and deleting tasks. Uses SQLite for data persistence and Pydantic models for data validation.

classes.name: Task
classes.description: Pydantic model representing a task with fields like id, title, description, and completed.

methods.name: health_check()
methods.description: Endpoint to perform a health check, returns a JSON message indicating health status.

methods.name: List[Task] list_tasks(conn: sqlite3.Connection = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Retrieves and returns all tasks ordered by id descending.

methods.name: Task create_task(payload: TaskCreate, conn: sqlite3.Connection = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Creates a new task with provided title and optional description, returns the created task.

methods.name: Task update_task(task_id: int, payload: TaskUpdate, conn: sqlite3.Connection = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Updates the specified task's title, description, and completed status.

methods.name: None delete_task(task_id: int, conn: sqlite3.Connection = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Deletes a task by its ID.

ctags.name: create_task
ctags.pattern: /^def create_task(payload: TaskCreate, conn: sqlite3.Connection = Depends(get_db)) -> Task:$/

ctags.name: delete_task
ctags.pattern: /^def delete_task(task_id: int, conn: sqlite3.Connection = Depends(get_db)) -> None:$/

ctags.name: update_task
ctags.pattern: /^def update_task(task_id: int, payload: TaskUpdate, conn: sqlite3.Connection = Depends(get_db)) -/
ctags.signature: (task_id: int, payload: TaskUpdate, conn: sqlite3.Connection = Depends(get_db))
